column4: im currently on my phone because my box is being bluh bluh.  i hope one of you can help me with just that though!  long story short anpther power supply is a dud, so now ive got my hds back in another new box...  its vga is intel corporation 82845G/GL chipset... what sort of driver do i need, and what can i do to reconfigure x... dpkg etc. doesnt work because the hds had nvidia-xorg and now it wont... well work.  please help?
